section.title: Definition
section.p: controller/precision property contains the maximum precision this controller is capable of, in number of steps.

Note that this value may not represent the actual precision exactly - for example, the precision for the particular servos in QuadServo, AdvancedServo, and Pololu family will depend on the current min_pulse and max_pulse settings. In order to retrieve the exact precision, use the servo/precision property.
